ukat.preproc.sitkutil¶

Tools relying on Simple ITK

The tools in this module should be general enough to be useful in the preprocessing of multiple types of MR data (e.g. diffusion, ASL, etc…)

get3D_from4D(img, idx)[source]¶

Extract a 3D image from the 4th dimension of a 4D image

Parameters

  • img (SimpleITK.SimpleITK.Image) – 4D SimpleITK image.

  • idx (int) – index of the 3D image (volume) to extract

Returns

3D SimpleITK image: extracted volume

Return type

SimpleITK.SimpleITK.Image

Notes

Uses SimpleITK’s ExtractImageFilter 1. Other files are in 2.

References

1

https://itk.org/Doxygen/html/classitk_1_1ExtractImageFilter.html

2

https://simpleitk.readthedocs.io/en/next/Documentation/docs/source/filters.html
